Welcome to CADD Stat

Do you struggle to find and run the correct statistic tests for your daily tasks? CADD Stat is an open source community web app aimed to assist computational chemists, cheminformaticans and others to add some statistics to their work.

Learn more »

Single series

  • Median Absolute Deviation New!

Two series

  • Kappa New!
  • Mann-Whitney U New!
  • Tau New!
  • Paired t-test New!
  • Pearson New!
  • Cohen's effect size New!

Three series

  • Friedman New!
